rows.label: tlk43310141_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Don't you think Divine Beast battleships are
wonderful? There's something so
inspiring about their majestic forms.

rows.label: tlk43310141_01_msg0002
rows.name:
The reason I joined the maintenance
corps was so I'd get to see all the
detailed workings of ships like this.

rows.label: tlk43310141_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Invidian battleships make the most
of the Divine Beast's natural features.
It's a key design philosophy.

rows.label: tlk43310141_01_msg0004
rows.name:
With ships like that, maintenance is all
about keeping the Divine Beast healthy and
looking after the organic nanotubes.

rows.label: tlk43310141_01_msg0005
rows.name:
I feel a little bad for the weaponized
Divine Beasts though. When war breaks out,
they get sent to the frontlines.

rows.label: tlk43310141_01_msg0006
rows.name:
Breaks my heart when they come back
and they're all smashed up. It really
gets me.
